data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 544,260 believers in the state of Huíla the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Huíla, Angola
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Huíla, Angola. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Huíla, Angola.
data.prayer: Spirit, make yourself real to these new families.
Pour your Spirit out on the 2,354,400 citizens of Huíla, Angola, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Huíla who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Chinese, general people.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Huíla, Angola.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,354,400 people living in the state of Huíla.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Huíla. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

location.name: Huíla
location.people_groups_list: Ndombe, Vasekela Bushman, Maligo, Mbangala, Kxoe, Xun, Simaa, Nyengo
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ndombe (49,000), Vasekela Bushman, Maligo (14,000), Mbangala (675,000), Kxoe, Xun (300), Simaa, Nyengo (24,000)
